headline: Climb faster with our AI coach
subtext: With our AI, it has never been easier to climb in League of Legends – analyze games in real time, calculate your win chance and get recommendations on how you and your team can win.
seo_title: League of Legends AI – Analyze your game in real time
seo_description: Climb ranked with AI support. Our League of Legends AI analyzes your matches in real time, evaluates objectives, team synergy, and meta trends.
seo_keywords: boost lol, all champions lol, lol spiele, u gg lol, lol lux, elise lol, lol accounts, lol ai, ai lol, league of legends ai, lol live analysis, ranked climb, objective tracker, meta stats, champion synergy, lol coaching, lol improvement, League of Legends AI Coach, Live LoL Match Analyse, increase winrate, get better in LoL, from iron to gold
features_title_big: The Future of League of Legends Coaching
features_description: Hans is your personal AI coach – analyzes your games, creates personalized training plans, and shows you how to think like a pro.
feature_ki_analysis_desc: Our AI analyzes your games in detail – from gold lead and objectives to decision-making. Learn exactly what separates you from the next rank.
feature_progress_desc: Track your growth over time with visual stats. (Coming soon)
feature_champion_advice_desc: See which champions give you the best advantage before the game starts. Our AI analyzes the enemy team in real-time and shows the best and worst picks for your win.
feature_live_coaching_desc: Receive real-time tips during the game – your personal challenger-level coach by your side.
champion_advisor_desc: Get champion suggestions during pick phase that work well against your opponents.
counterpicks_desc: Try it out! Pick your opponents’ champions and get the top 5 counterpicks against each.
timeline_title_big: Building the Future of AI Coaching
timeline_description: From an ambitious idea to a revolutionary coaching platform – see how Hans evolves step by step.
timeline_step_3_desc: Our community get a better winrate in just 7 days
reviews_login_prompt: Please log in to write a review.
faq_description: Here you can find answers to the most common questions about Hans AI Coach.
faq_1_answer: Hans is your personal AI-powered League of Legends coach. He analyzes your games in real-time, tracks your performance, and gives you personalized tips to help you climb faster.
faq_2_question: How does the AI coaching work?
faq_2_answer: The AI analyzes your game data – including kills, deaths, assists, map movements, and item builds – and generates personalized improvement suggestions based on pro strategies and best practices.
faq_3_answer: No, currently no subscription is required. Hans AI Coach is in beta and is fully free to use. Later there will be different pricing tiers depending on how many games you track and how deep the coaching analysis goes.
faq_4_question: Can I cancel my account or future subscriptions anytime?
faq_4_answer: Yes, absolutely! Once the paid version is activated, you can manage and cancel your account or subscription anytime directly from your dashboard.
faq_5_answer: Yes! All your game and personal data is securely transmitted and stored according to modern privacy standards. Your data belongs exclusively to you.
faq_6_answer: Windows Defender may show a warning because the application currently has no official code certification. This costs 350–500 €. Since I'm a student and developing Hans AI Coach as a solo project, I currently can't afford this. The software is safe.
faq_7_answer: Yes! In the current beta version, Hans AI Coach is completely free. You can test all core features and give feedback to improve development. In the future, there will be a fair pricing model with different tiers.
faq_8_question: Can I get banned for using it?
faq_8_answer: No. Our software does not violate Riot Games rules. We act like a normal live coach: analysis happens outside the game, without interacting with the client or gameplay. We only use the official Riot API, which Riot explicitly allows. Therefore, a ban is impossible.
footer_newsletter_title: Stay up to date with Hans AI
footer_newsletter_desc: Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive updates, early access to new features, and coaching tips directly from our AI coach.

downloadText: Download the latest version and start your journey with Hans AI Coach.
requirement2: At least 4 GB RAM and 500 MB free storage
privacyIntro: Protecting your personal data is important to us. Below we transparently inform you about the type, scope, and purpose of processing personal data.
controllerText:
Hans AI Coach
CEO: Finn Paustian
Am Rund 6, 23455 Lübeck
Email: hansaicoach@gmail.com
dataProcessedText: We process e.g. name, email, username, profile info (e.g. in-game name, rank), technical data (IP, browser, log data) as well as payment confirmations (e.g. PayPal status). Sensitive data is not consciously collected.
purposeText: Processing is carried out for contract fulfillment (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR), to comply with legal obligations (lit. c) or based on legitimate interests (lit. f), e.g. IT security or platform functionality. Consent is obtained where required.
paypalText1: We use PayPal for payment processing. Payment data is transmitted directly to PayPal; we only receive payment confirmations from PayPal. More info:
paypalText2: Note: When paying via PayPal, cookies may be set on the PayPal page; this processing is the responsibility of PayPal.
hostingText: Our infrastructure (frontend/backend) is hosted by European providers (e.g. Vercel / Render). The database (MongoDB Atlas) is connected via encrypted TLS. Access is only via secure connections.
cookiesText: We only use technically necessary cookies required to provide our services (e.g. session cookies for login, CSRF token, security cookies). These cookies are exempt from consent requirements.
cookieSummaryList: Functional cookies: necessary, set without consent.
PayPal: PayPal may set cookies when redirecting — this happens on PayPal’s site.
Tracking/Analytics: Currently no tracking (e.g. Google Analytics) is embedded — no consent banner required.
thirdPartyText: Personal data is only shared if necessary for contract fulfillment (e.g. payment providers), required by law, or you have given consent. We have data processing agreements (DPA) with our service providers.
storageText: We only store personal data as long as necessary for the purposes or legally required (e.g. statutory retention periods for invoices).
rightsText: You have the right to access, correct, delete, restrict processing, data portability, and objection. To exercise your rights, please contact us at legal@sia.ai.
securityText: We implement technical and organizational measures, e.g. HTTPS, encrypted connections, secure password storage (hashing) and access controls to protect your data as best as possible.
changesText: This privacy policy may be adjusted. The current version is available on this page. Last update: November 2025.
legalIntro: Information according to § 5 TMG and § 55 RStV
responsibleText:

Am Rund 6
23566 Lübeck
